example:
() => (
  <InputField
    label="Password"
    placeholder="paSsw0rd"
    type="password"
    help="Use at least one uppercase letter and one number"
    error="Your password must contain a number"
  />
)

info.title: Error messages
info.description: Include error messages when validation isn't passed, either on change in focus or form submission. Note that an error message will override any help text.
